interview.question: You might play Serena Williams for the first time in the third round. Can you talk about your thoughts going into that match?
Can you talk about your thoughts?
interview.answer: Yeah, she's of course great player and a great champion. I just want to try my best out there.And I never played her, so, yeah, just go on the court and hope I can play well and enjoy the match.

interview.question: What are your goals for this year? Do you have any ranking goals?
Just wondering what your ranking goals are this year.
interview.answer: I hope I can get top 50 first, but I didn't play very well this year, so I just want to continue to play good in every match.Yeah, I will see at the end of my year.
